text: Hi <@U04L8B6J95G>, did you ever receive a response on this? I am having the same problem just pinging HubSpot's API from within a serverless function and it's taking 5-6 seconds to query. After a few tries it seems to 'warm up' due to caching, but that's neither a great nor consistent experience.
That being said, the HS API itself is consistently fast when run locally - around 200ms. Does anyone else have any performance-related tips to optimize the speed for serverless functions?
No, no response. We do a empty call a first that speeds things up. So then the warm up is quicker.
<@U04L8B6J95G> - thanks for the response - I was hoping I might not need to leverage polling but since this is a wrapper on AWS Lambda and I have to do it there as well.... I understand.
